definition: to try sth out/to be on probation
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
inspection copy (of a textbook etc)/trial edition

sentences.english: Complimentary sampler of our new cream with any $25 purchase.
sentences.chinese: 买满25元就可以获赠面霜免费试用装。

sentences.english: This paper described a novel thermopile detector for infrared horizon sensors.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了试用于红外地平仪的新型热堆传感器。

sentences.english: There is a raise after three months probation period according to your performance.
sentences.chinese: 三个月的试用期过后，将根据工作表现加薪。

sentences.english: On-line order and signup for online trial.
sentences.chinese: 网上订单和注册为在线试用。

sentences.english: Any of our new products shall go through a 1 - 3 month tes?ting period.
sentences.chinese: 我们的任何一件新产品都有一至三个月的试用期。

sentences.english: I had tried two of the incenses you sent.
sentences.chinese: 我已试用了您所寄来的香中的两种。

sentences.english: Try out several people, all because let elder brother don't like and did not become.
sentences.chinese: 试用数人，均因容哥不喜欢而未成。

sentences.english: Tried-and-true methods mix with fresh concepts to create better wildland fleets .
sentences.chinese: 试用真实方法混合新鲜理念，创造出更好的荒地船队。

sentences.english: Today, I decided to try a self-tanning lotion my friend had recommended. I put it on, and decided to take a nap.
sentences.chinese: 今天我试用了一下朋友推荐的晒黑霜，然后去睡觉。

sentences.english: Article 6 While recruiting labour-contract workers, the enterprise shall state explicitly in the contract a probational period.
sentences.chinese: 第六条企业招用劳动合同制工人，应当订明试用期。

sentences.english: It’s much easier to take this step during the probationary period than it is later on.
sentences.chinese: 在试用期做出解雇的决定要比以后做出决定容易得多。

sentences.english: The probation effect is very good.
We will provide the necessary equipment, such as information services to the probation agents.
sentences.chinese: 我们为代理商提供试用装等必要的宣传资料服务。

sentences.english: Saya will start teaching full-time after passing a trial term at a Tokyo primary school.
sentences.chinese: 如果通过试用期，她将开始她的全职教师生涯。

sentences.english: The best way to test a man's ability is the try him out in practical work.
sentences.chinese: 在工作中试用一个人是检验他能力的最好方法。

sentences.english: Everyone on the team begins using the test cases to test the product.
sentences.chinese: 团队中的每一员都开始使用测试用例来测试产品。

definition: to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to debug/to adjust components during testing/debugging
to take measurements/measured (speed etc)/observed (as opposed to "estimated")/observational (astronomy)
